amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to provide to a State or local government entity or official that is in violation of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the Poe (TX) amendment (A031). Mr. Aderholt stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriationbill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
